numbered_ace_sentences: 2. If a person gets older then the person has less hope that the world will be a better place.
3. I wonder what must happen in a person's life.
4. I wonder what can change a person's views drastically.
5. This change can happen when the person gets older.
6. This change can happen when the person experiences more in the world.
8. I see that my view changes when I get older.
9. I see that the views of people around me change when they get older.
10. Therefore I can resonate with people on this chart.
11. The title is: Is there hope for this world?
